EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_TrackerTrainings_Q314.Invite - SF Sept. 29, 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited to Pivotal Tracker Training Session in San Francisco - Sept. 29
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, You and a member of your team are invited to an exclusive Pivotal Tracker Training Session on Sept. 29 from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at our San Francisco office. We’ll walk through Pivotal Tracker’s capabilities in the new UI (currently in beta). The session is geared towards newer Tracker users, but we'll share a few advanced tips and tricks as well. Most importantly, we want to hear from you and we'll have experts on-hand to answer all of your Tracker and project management questions. Seating is limited to the first 12 registrants. Event details are below. Pivotal Tracker Training Session Date: Monday, Sept. 29, 2014 Time: 11 a.m. - 1 p.m. (lunch will be provided) Location: 875 Howard Street, San Francisco, CA Cost: This invite-only session is free to attend. Reply to this email to RSVP. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask. We look forward to hosting you for this special event! Regards, Charles Charles Springer Pivotal Tracker
